00001 #ifndef MANGLE_SOUND_OGRELISTENERMOVER_H
00002 #define MANGLE_SOUND_OGRELISTENERMOVER_H
00003 
00004 #include <OgreCamera.h>
00005 #include <assert.h>
00006 #include "../output.hpp"
00007 
00008 namespace Mangle {
00009 namespace Sound {
00010 
00016   struct OgreListenerMover : Ogre::Camera::Listener
00017   {
00018     OgreListenerMover(Mangle::Sound::SoundFactoryPtr snd)
00019       : soundFact(snd), camera(NULL)
00020     {}
00021 
00024     void followCamera(Ogre::Camera *cam)
00025     {
00026       camera = cam;
00027       camera->addListener(this);
00028     }
00029 
00030     void unfollowCamera()
00031     {
00032         // If the camera is null, this object wasn't following a camera.
00033         // It doesn't make sense to call unfollow
00034         assert(camera != NULL);
00035 
00036         camera->removeListener(this);
00037         camera = NULL;
00038     }
00039 
00040   private:
00041     Mangle::Sound::SoundFactoryPtr soundFact;
00042     Ogre::Camera *camera;
00043     Ogre::Vector3 pos, dir, up;
00044 
00049     void cameraPreRenderScene(Ogre::Camera *cam)
00050     {
00051       assert(cam == camera);
00052 
00053       Ogre::Vector3 nPos, nDir, nUp;
00054 
00055       nPos = camera->getPosition();
00056       nDir = camera->getDirection();
00057       nUp  = camera->getUp();
00058 
00059       // Don't bother the sound system needlessly
00060       if(nDir != dir || nPos != pos || nUp != up)
00061         {
00062           pos = nPos;
00063           dir = nDir;
00064           up  = nUp;
00065 
00066           soundFact->setListenerPos(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z,
00067                                     dir.x, dir.y, dir.z,
00068                                     up.x, up.y, up.z);
00069         }
00070     }
00071 
00072     void cameraDestroyed(Ogre::Camera *cam)
00073     {
00074       assert(cam == camera);
00075       camera = NULL;
00076     }
00077   };
00078 }}
00079 #endif
